entities.name: love
entities.description: The narrator believes that love leaves its own mark on the person who receives it.

entities.name: mother
entities.description: The mother's love is mentioned as an example of powerful love.

entities.name: Quirrell
entities.description: Quirrell is described as full of hatred, greed and ambition, sharing his soul with Voldemort.

entities.name: Voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort's influence on Quirrell is mentioned.

relationships.description: Quirrell is described as sharing his soul with Voldemort.
